{"id":645891422,"lang":"cpp","time":"4 months, 2 weeks","timestamp":1645434402,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"6 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/645891422/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Happy Number","memory":"5.9 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    \n    int findsquare(int n){\n        long long int ans=0;\n        \n        while(n>0){\n            int rem=n%10;\n            ans+=rem*rem;\n            n/=10;\n        }\n        return ans;\n    }\n    bool isHappy(int n) {\n        \n        \n        \n        int fast=n;\n        int slow=n;\n        \n        do{\n            \n            slow=findsquare(slow);\n            fast=findsquare(findsquare(fast));\n            \n        } while (slow!=fast);\n            \n            if(slow==1){\n                return true;\n            }\n        return false;\n        \n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"happy-number"}
